plot: Burnout pizza boy Jonathan "Lynchy" Lynch finds himself being seduced by a sexy, older housewife while making a delivery. His fortunes change, however, when he learns that she is attempting to frame him for the murder of her husband.
title: The Pizza Boy
plot_es: Burnout pizza boy Jonathan "Lynchy" Lynch finds himself being seduced by a sexy, older housewife while making a delivery. His fortunes change, however, when he learns that she is attempting to frame him for the murder of her husband.
plot_en: Burnout pizza boy Jonathan "Lynchy" Lynch finds himself being seduced by a sexy, older housewife while making a delivery. His fortunes change, however, when he learns that she is attempting to frame him for the murder of her husband.
